Muy buen juego, te entretiene mucho, cumple sus objetivos, pero eso si la comunidad medio rancia pero bueno el juego ta bien.

[h1] An√°lise [/h1]

[b] Pr√≥s: [/b]

-√â um jogo competitivo, e todo jogo competitivo te prende pelo fato de sempre querer melhorar.

-√â um tema inovador(pelo menos na √©poca do seu lan√ßamento) e at√© hoje n√£o tem nenhum melhor no mesmo estilo.

-Capitaliza√ß√£o, poder ganhar pontos para gastar e melhorar seu pr√≥prio personagem tanto visualmente quanto competitivamente.

-Personagens famosos de outros filmes/s√©ries de terror est√£o nesse jogo e, periodicamente, ir√£o lan√ßar mais.

-Curva de aprendizagem desafiadora.

[b] Contras: [/b]


-Um dos principais problemas desse jogo, BUGS , esse jogo √© lotado de bugs e, cerca de 20% deles s√£o bugs que atrapalham direto na sa√∫de e gameplay do jogo como por exemplo, bugs que voc√™ j√° entra na partida sem conseguir se curar ou
curar algu√©m, tenta se esconder atr√°s de uma √°rvore e por algum motivo da f√≠sica voc√™ gruda nela e nunca mais consegue sair a menos que morra, o port√£o de sa√≠da n√£o funcionar e voc√™ ficar preso no jogo pra sempre entre outros muitos.

Mal comprometimento com o jogo 
Dead by Daylight j√° existe a mais de 3 ANOS e ainda assim n√£o existe um servidor dedicado(Junho de 2019), temos que enfrentar lag switchers e tempos de fila ENORMES at√© achar uma sala com um ping "jog√°vel", pois quem hosteia a sala √© o killer, tamb√©m existe a chance do mesmo ficar irritado por estar jogando mal ou a internet dele cair e a sala s√≥ fechar e pronto, 4 sobreviventes que esperaram 30 minutos pra encontrar uma partida(n√£o por falta de jogador), v√£o ter que encontrar outra e lidar com a perda de rank(sim, os sobreviventes perdem rank se o killer quitar da partida)

Al√©m disso o jogo n√£o possui um lobby ent√£o, se estiver jogando com amigos, toda vez que voc√™s estiverem procurando uma partida e ela vier com o ping ruim, todos v√£o ter que qutar um por um e algu√©m vai ter que chamar todo mundo denovo, por que o jogo em 3 ANOS n√£o conseguiu criar um lobby, uma coisa t√£o simples.

Tamb√©m nem √© preciso citar as hitboxes desse jogo, que s√£o horrorosas, voc√™ toma/acerta um golpe de killer √† 5 metros de dist√¢ncia do sobrevivente, mas creio que a quest√£o das hitboxes s√£o agravadas pelo fato do jogo n√£o ter um servidor dedicado e o ping da sala atrapalhar.

[h1] Sistema de ranking [/h1]

O sistema de ranking atual n√£o checa de fato a habilidade de nenhum jogador e eu vou dizer o porqu√™.
Atualmente o sistema de ranking n√£o recompensa com nada o jogador que conseguir chegar e se manter no Rank 1 (rank mais alto), e com isso, o jogador n√£o sente nenhuma vontade de se manter ou se quer chegar nos ranks mais altos.

Al√©m do mais, quando voc√™ conseguir chegar nos ranks mais altos, sabe o que vai te acontecer? Como voc√™ vai ser recompensado? 
Com filas de partidas ABSURDAS e jogadores extremamente t√≥xicos, que grande maioria s√£o abusadores de t√°ticas roubadas do jogo e exploits e n√£o bons jogadores, por que al√©m de tudo a Behavior √© p√©ssima com balanceamento, e sempre existir√£o perks, killers, itens ou add-ons que se usados de tal forma, v√£o ser quase imposs√≠veis de se jogar contra.
Por isso, a maioria dos jogadores caem de rank por contra pr√≥pria, quitando das partidas, sem receber nenhuma puni√ß√£o, e o jogo fica extremamente desbalanceado para jogadores casuais ou novatos, que s√£o obrigados a jogar contra sobreviventes experientes desde as primeiras horas de jogo.

[h1] Dificuldade [/h1]

A dificuldade do jogo √© algo nem um pouco atraente para jogadores novos, faz o jogo ficar chato, por que eles n√£o conseguem entender nem o b√°sico, ent√£o o jogador s√≥ fica perdido, morre e se questiona, o qu√™ diabos eu estou fazendo jogando isso?

Dead by Daylight s√≥ te recompensa por jogar bem, se voc√™ jogar medianamente/ruim, voc√™ vai ser massacrado.

A linha de aprendizagem de sobrevivente √© extremamente alta, enquanto a de killer nem tanto, aprender o b√°sico e jogar medianamente de killer √© f√°cil, de sobrevivente √© uma eternidade de partidas pra se pegar o jeito, fator que faz os novatos s√≥ se sentirem violados e completamente impotentes contra o killer, por ele parecer extremamente mais overpower que os sobreviventes.

[h1] Conclus√£o [/h1]

Dead by Daylight √© um jogo que voc√™ vai passar mais tempo numa fila de partida do que jogando e grande parte da partida reclamando de coisas que tinham que ser melhores, por√©m ainda existem partidas muito divertidas que voc√™ at√© esquece o jogo que est√° jogando.

Acho que grande parte desses problemas se d√£o pelo fato do jogo n√£o ter concorr√™ncia, ent√£o eles se sentem livres para fazer as coisas do jeito deles e no tempo deles, se j√° existisse um outro jogo que batesse de frente com DBD, e jogadores estivessem periodicamente migrando para ele, a Behavior iria acordar e come√ßar a atualizar o jogo com frequ√™ncia, de acordo com a vontade dos jogadores.

Aight. First off this game IS NOT for everyone. for many people it will seem unfair or just boring. the game has a quite large assortment of bugs, from visual glitches to gamebreaking. the game is kinda pay-2-win in a way but you can get almost anything if you wait long enough. Though for everything this game does bad. It has a lot of good things, it is a great concept and every match feels different. It has a pretty good community with a small toxic part. The game overall is a quite good, you get quite frequent updates. The devs feel connected to the game. Just dont run certain perks, some are garbage. ((GHOSTFACE IS BEST KILLER))

Unless SWF is made unranked only it doesn't make much sense, the entitiy doesn't give these random survivors who don't know each other headsets to communicate in the lore so why would you allow them to know all this information in ranked play let alone at all. It just kills the horror aspect of the game and makes the entire experience kind of dim compared to what it could be. Call it killer bullying simulator 2019 because that's all it is unless you encounter rare solo survivors past yellow ranks.

Este juego es la repera quien no lo tenga pues no pasa nada hay muchos juegos gratis que regalan por ah√≠ aunque sin duda la mec√°nica de este juego me flipa como asesino es algo que no tiene ning√∫n otro juego menos hecho por fans claro est√°...hay de todo en general.- En Asesino lo malo est√° en el ranking ah√≠ se genera mucha mucha toxicidad por parte de los supervivientes es algo que me parece lo peor,si quieres jugar bien y a gusto...juega en una partida que sea con niveles bajos y por supuesto aseg√∫rate que haya personajes sin legacy o prestigio.Normalmente el juego suele emparejarte con los de mayor nivel...Pero eso no es as√≠!Todos suelen ser rango 1 y bajan de rango r√°pido para luego vacilarte en partida, aseg√∫rense de siempre tener perks a mano como "Resistente" o "Noed" aunque es una alternativa arriesgada de perder en partida y suele dar mucho partido.- En cuanto a superviviente lo √∫nico que debes saber es coordinarse es algo poderoso pero siempre habr√° una contra de esto...los totems...asegurate de salvar 1¬∫ al superviviente m√°s pr√≥ximo entre s√≠ porque hay muchos que se rinden y no aportan lo necesario en partida una cualidad l√≥gica sabiendo que los generadores apenas arrancan sin una bonificaci√≥n de lado.Nada m√°s que decir bienvenidos a Dead by Daylight.

You know what game i really hate?

Ghost Recon Wildlands

Let's talk about 'tactical realism'

Not real life. not the simulation of military life. Tactical realism.

anyway Ghost recon wildlands claims to be on the cutting edge of tactical realism

Just don't tell that to any current, former, or future operatives who will instantly bring up [b]magic bullet issue[/b]
[i]Magic bullet?[/i]

you read that correctly.
Not only can you tag an enemy soldier who will walk into a building without losing the 'tag' that tracks his moments with extreme precision, but your teammates instantly become JFK murdering sniper elite; sneaking through the trees, the bushes, the tall grass, the short grass..... the air.

They become invisible. They are only visible to the enemy when you are spotted.
[b]Welcome to tactical realism[/b]

So you set 3 targets you'd like your team to eliminate?
Darn. they walked into a building that was reinforced with 4 feet thick concrete walls. Whelp i guess you will need to patiently wait like a real sni-

[i]did you just shoot all 4?[/i]
all 4?
at once?
through concrete?
no visual on the targets?

That's realistic. I have spoken with many millions of current, former and future members of the united states marine corps who tell me that this is how they deal with every engagement & that it is, in fact, standard operating procedure to use the [b]magic bullet strike[/b]

Cruise missiles are outdated.
Welcome to the new world.

For the sake of tactical realism, i'm gonna have one of my soldiers carry a drone that will weigh him down considerably and likely be only useful if i w- NEVER it WILL never BE useful. NEVER.

There was this invention called binoculars. The [i]binocular[/i] can be pulled out in roughly under 60 seconds. Oddly, they have an unlimited power supply, and it takes only the knowledge of how to hold 2 cups vertically to operate them. Tactically, i feel binoculars are realistic and the best decision for recon but thankfully Ubisoft has enlightened me on the issue. Many current, former, and future soldiers should know that binoculars are not as efficient in stealth surveillance of the enemy as a buzzing mechanical bird that flies unnaturally.


But don't worry
fortunately the A.I. makes up for the glaring holes in the set up and delivery of Ghost Recon Wildland(s)

The first time i stuck my drone eye length with an enemy and he seemed to slowly notice that a flying machine was hovering just feet from his nose, i sat back and realised that GRW is probably the first and only game to actually capture the fact that some soldiers do actually suffer from mental conditions such as blindness & also deafness, some soldiers are mute to physical touch and i feel [i]so[/i] happy that Ubisoft took the step to include disabled people as soldiers, albeit enemy soldiers.


But on [b]tactical[/b] realism :
There is considerably no tactics.

You don't really stack up on buildings and clear rooms because the AI doesnt require you to do that. They will run at you like zombies with guns. They don't actually stay in place, hold a defensive position and wait for you to clear it.

If you shoot at the enemy, they don't flank you. They turn and run at you like zombies with guns.
If you lob mortars, they don't seek cover. They turn and run at you like zombies with guns.
If you are outnumbered, they will run at you like zombies with guns
If you outnumber them, they will run at you like zombies with guns

If you set up an ambush, they won't seek cover and try to figure out where you are. They automatically know and run at you like zombies with guns.


It doesn't matter if you use a line formation, echelon, wedge. Nothing matters. The result is the exact same.
The loadout you use doesn't matter because magic bullet.

The shooting mechanics are like pubg meets fortnite if you decide to not use the magic bullet and force and actually have gunfights but the sad reality that you can complete entire engagements without ever firing anything but magic bullets is a bit weird in that it feels like that game plays itself while you just say "kill this, this, this, and this guy. Okay now move up. kill this this this and this guy. move up"


And for the sake of tactical realism. You can get shot anywhere with no specific effect. This means that it doesnt matter how you use cover, all wounds are the same. So you get shot in the arm, you get revived by a teammate, and you get up with no problem with your arm.

There's unlimited medical supplies because there is no supplies which means you don't need to consider fire rate, engagement length, thereby engagement efficiency or precision of attack. 

It's just a cosplay roleplaying game for lil kids packaged as a game for adults who like tactics and layers of realism.
That's why you should play dead by daylight
dead by daylight is dope

This game is super addictive and fun,and has many new updates every month.The game never gets boring.This game has a good premise and its done so good.This game is just sooooooooo mutch fun,i played this game a lot as all of you can see.I love that this game has licensed and its own original killers and survivors.The game looks great and the soundtrack(music) is just so good.Only problem i have with the game is that,that the developers a lot of times change perks and the game for worse.I would recommend this game to everyone.

On this game have to side of survivors and killers

After that is so long short review is ending up there üëÜ  but if you need to know more just read below 

But this is comment for beginning player between rank 20 to rank 15 that's bottom rank range on this game and you random match (don't play with team play) please read this

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄüèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇ For playing Survivors üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄüèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇ : 
üîµ If you play only one character you have to repair generators, help you friend from hook and try to learn path on many maps in this game. On the beginning maybe you will lucky for survived but mostly starter is dead from Momento Mori by killer's hand or 
sacrificed üòÖ
üîµ Try to learn about ability of every survivors and killer that's can help you for beginning because Perk is everything on this game. Better Perk, Better escaped ways ( such as with some of item can help you open secret door, med-kit for heal and tool box for fix generator)
üîµ You will learn new word about 'Camper' that's called for Killer who don't try to find another survivors but they will catch only one or two survivors and stand near people who hooked for waiting someone came for help this bad lucky guy and hit helper. Bad ways mostly team will died because of kindness for want to help team member
üîπ But, If you meet camper please repair generators before or if you're people on hooked please wait not try to unhooked by yourself. If you have Luck Offering maybe it worked or if it's not you will died early than other
üîπ And try to calm down when you met Camper, sometime survivors who hooked by camper on that match will try to died and out of this game early. Some of them will disconnected of that match by unplug icon showing on that survivors because mostly survivors who play main roles for survivors DON'T LIKE CAMPER so please be kind with them and not hot-headed 
üîπ Mostly Camper that I was met on this game are üôá‚Äç‚ôÄCannibal, ü§° CLOWN   ,üõé WRAITH, other some.
üîπ (Optional) Mostly killers will thinks Camper is the ways to win the game that is not true or false on my opinion but mostly survivors will not love it. Just that is. My friend talked about Game Theory on Mathematical Science, Win-Win game is the good way for both side with survivors and killers. Don't like camper is your choices and killer will play camper that's their choices too. Please considering about it üòÖ
üîπ (Optional) I tried to write GGWP - Good game, well play :) for every killer who play good and make the game more fun, sometimes my team is completely died on hook, Momento Mori or other several ways but main of this fun is we tried to survived, healing friends, repair generators, clear totems, run away from killer. I think this is heart of this game for make fun and more point to upgrade all characters üòâ
üîµ And some killer are new player like you or they did not play great with killer or they want to do their daily quest with killer characters. Mostly of them will release you, just run for chased you or hit you for their quest. (Please) Do not type easy - ez on comment box but this is optional so only thing that's I can do for this game is beg many player to do better things for other
üîµ Mostly, Killers (especially camper) will quick out of disconnection of match when the match ended. If you love someone play-style or want to play with other survivors on this match you could add friend with them on steam on that room before you leave bc this game did not have match recorded, lol
üîµ A little bit suggestion, be careful with body block some ways with you and your team when run away from killer ;D

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

üòàüëø For playing Killers üòàüëø
‚≠ï Of course, our objective is kill or survivors before they completely repair generators 
‚≠ï So many killer that you can choose to play but for my suggest if you don't have DLC. I suggest Trapper for beginner and when you know more map and hiding places on several map including some perk working with survivors and your killer. The Nurse is good choices for chase survivors. But this is just only my opinion. Maybe you can choose any character and you love they appearance and play other killer for learn teachable perks for character you loved!
‚≠ï When you play a few times you will think killer is hardly to play but if you can read their mark on the ground, know many place that have pallets, heard heartbeat of survivors in locker or can hurt someone to dying state. It's make you fun. I think that's great for playing üòπ

‚≠ï Good way for playing killer for me is earn more blood point with catch survivors, hooked them, damage generators, destroyed obstacle, closed secret door or other.
